name: The Lost Sword
description: The Lost Sword is an action game in the 3D platform subcategory, where the player character is best described as a warrior robot from a parallel universe. The first three levels contain obstacle objects, guardian enemies, health coins, and an goal object; The fourth level contains several noisy objects, guardian enemies ,and the Boss. The third and most important objective is The Lost Sword (found in level three), and once the player obtains it, he/she will be ready to face the Boss.  Avoiding touching enemies is crucial to survive.
